summary: This is an email exchange between Marc A. Weinstein and an unnamed recipient regarding scheduling a call to provide an update on a new development concerning the Epstein Estate. The email includes a standard confidentiality disclaimer from Weinstein's law firm.

persons.name: Marc A. Weinstein
persons.role: Partner, Chair of White Collar Defense at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP
persons.context: He is the sender of an email offering an update on the Epstein Estate and is identified as a partner at a law firm.

persons.name: Andrew Tomback
persons.context: He is copied on the email exchange about the Epstein Estate update.

connections.description: Both are included in the same email correspondence regarding the Epstein Estate, suggesting a professional or legal association.

events.title: Epstein Estate update discussion
events.description: Marc A. Weinstein emails to schedule a call to provide an update on a new development regarding the Epstein Estate.

keyFacts: The email is dated November 9, 2020, indicating ongoing legal or administrative activity related to the Epstein Estate well after Jeffrey Epstein's death.
Marc A. Weinstein, a partner at Hughes Hubbard & Reed LLP, is involved in providing an update on the Epstein Estate, suggesting legal representation or advisory role.
The email contains a standard legal confidentiality disclaimer, indicating the sensitive nature of the communication regarding the Epstein Estate.
